metadata.title: CVE-2021-47484 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:octeontx2-af: Fix possible null pointer dereference.This patch fixes possible null pointer dereference in files"rvu_debugfs.c" and "rvu_nix.c"

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
